Trigger You're about to attempt a Fortitude save or a Reflex save.

Flames scouring at your body, venom coursing through your veins-you refuse to believe they exist, and nothing can affect you if you don't believe in it. You attempt a Will save against the triggering effect, instead of a Reflex or Fortitude save. You don't gain the benefits of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.Fortress of Will] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.Walls of Will] on this save.
